name: Procyon (itch) (Kit Procyon, LauraQwerty, Gintm, Aitor López, lluispalerm, Rubn)
name_original: Procyon (itch) (Kit Procyon, LauraQwerty, Gintm, Aitor López, lluispalerm, Rubn)
description:
PROCYON HELP OUR LITTLE RACCOON TO FIND HIS MOTHER!
  • Join this epic adventure along the forest seen from the eyes of a friendly little raccoon. 
  • Help him find his missing mother along all the levels made with ♡.
  • Will you be able to overcome all the dangers that the forest have to offer?
*You can skip the first cutscene pressing ANY KEY* Keyboard controls: 

-ARROWS: Controls the  movement of the Raccoon + Climb

-SPACE BAR: Jump

-W: Silent mode

Gamepad controls:

-LEFT JOYSTICK: Controls the movement of the Raccoon + Climb

-'A' : Jump

-'B': Silent mode
